content.rendered:
A few words

About Us

Overview

Surrounded By Serenity

With its one-of-a-kind experience near Malathalli Lake, Kings Club creates memorable experiences Nagarbhavi, West Bangalore, offers a variety of sports and leisure services. The area has been designed to be a lifestyle destination. 

Your Club experience will be unlike anything you’ve ever had before. The club focuses on the following: Taking stress out of your life and making it more fun! Engage in a variety of sports Take advantage of family entertainment and make the most of the services. The Kings Club membership allows you to be a part of a private community, provides social opportunities, enlarges your peer groups, and rejuvenates your life for as long as you desire.

 

A Vision Of An Avant-garde

Among Bangalore’s startups, we are a pioneer in an unexplored field. Our vision at Kings Club is to create experiences you’d want to repeat over and over. A picturesque clubhouse complete with all the amenities was created using our premier craftsmanship and design expertise. Our goal at Kings Club is to help you connect with your inner peace and joy so that you can live life fully.

What makes us different?

Destination Of Desire

This is a club that reflects the royal lifestyle and grows on you with time. It’s a collection of experiences that make you feel at home. Our efforts support your community-building practices and provide a place for professional or social networking. 

This is a place you frequent often rather than once in a while. During the sports and fun activities, the children are able to laugh, grow, and play in an atmosphere that is child-friendly.

All-for-one

We have designed an elite club for an elite community of people. King’s Club membership not only adds to one’s social status, but elevates their lifestyle as well as enhances their network. As we are dedicated to providing the best standards of amenities and class, we believe we are adding value to everyone’s lives. Has a premium club ever offered affordable memberships before? Not even once. 

We’re glad to be the first in Bengaluru! Kings Club is a place where you can be joyful and healthy with your family, and we want to be your pride. In exchange for a premium membership which is valid for 10 years following the date of signing up, we promise to serve you with luxury and a plethora of sports facilities. We invite you to become a member of our family, for this is where life begins.

Main Lobby

Kings Club embodies a spacious design beyond typical structures and is surrounded by lots of green spaces, the club has ample daylighting, allowing fresh air to fill the air inside.
